starwars.actions

Class Force

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Action
      • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Affordance
        • starwars.SWAffordance
          • starwars.actions.Force
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.ActionInterface, java.lang.Comparable<edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.ActionInterface>, starwars.SWActionInterface

    public class Force
extends starwars.SWAffordance
    An Affordance for controlling movement of weak-minded organics by people with lots of force. This action is also connected with wielding a Lightsaber (not implemented in this class but when player picks it up)

    The affordance is offered by weak-minded organics and can only be applied in partnership with an starwars that is PeopleWithForce and has ForceAbility equal to 100

    Author:
    WENGER_OUT
    See Also:
    starwars.PeopleWithForce}, starwars.WeakMinded}, starwars.entities.LightSaber}

    • Method Detail

      • canDo

        public boolean canDo(starwars.SWActor a)
        Determine whether a particular SWActor a can use Force on the target.
        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor being queried
        Returns:
        true if any SWActor has lots of force (forceAbility = 100) and an instance of WeakMinded is present in same location

      • act

        public void act(starwars.SWActor a)
        Perform the Force command on an WeakMinded entity.

        This method is only applicable if,

        • The target of the Force is WeakMinded (forceAbility = 0)
        • The the SWActor a has lots of force (forceAbility = 100)

        This will cause the target to move in the direction desired by the player for one turn

        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor who is using Force
        See Also:
        SWActor.isDead(), starwars.Move, WeakMinded, PeopleWithForce
